description.narrative: Les acteurs en charge des secteurs sociaux (ministeres, parlement, collectivites locales) sont a meme de concevoir, mettre en oeuvre et suivre/evaluer les politiques, les CDMT et les budgets favorables aux enfants, en appliquant l'approche de programmation basÃ©e sur les resultats/droits humains/genre, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Public Finance And Local Governance. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Renforcement capacites de l'administration pour une formulation et une mise en Å“uvre efficaces des politiques en faveur des enfants

sector.narrative: Child poverty public advocacy (media and social media, campaigns)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
